item.title: Text 317 "DELTA"
item.dc:creator: @I_love_U_I I love U I
item.description:
@I_love_U_I wrote:

Hi, i would like some help with changing my text to colored text. Before anyone starts saying oooh!! im not gonna spoon feed you. -.-. I tried the best i can, i tried

if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = “@red@[Co-Owner]-”;
}

But still didn’t work, every time i ::talk it doe’s something like this “@red@co-owner”. I’ve also tried many other colors but didn’t. well, i hope anyone can help.

I will greatly appreciate it! Ty for your time.

Read full topic
